name: This Is Not My Burrow
description: This Is Not My Burrow In the skin of a hamster that walks on two legs that got into a place where it should not be, now it must escape from this place where it will probably lose many lives. The game can be played now in the browser but I still recommend downloading the .exe for a better experience The game contains screenshakes, framefreeze and a little changes of color in screen For those who like to compete, there is a timer, it restarts everytime you die but it stops when you finish the level and stays in the next screen, good luck
